long_description: No one wants to lose a paddle! The Sea to Summit paddle leash keeps your boat and your paddle securely tethered. Tough attachment point adjusts to fit the shaft of your paddle. The Sea to Summit paddle leash stretches as you paddle so it won't encumber your stroke; extends to 3 ft. 7 in.
short_description: No one wants to lose a paddle! The Sea to Summit paddle leash keeps your boat and your paddle securely tethered.
